mcq.statement: Which Congress leaders participated in the Shimla Conference of 1945?

options.a: Quaid-e-Azam, Liaquat Ali Khan, and Abdurrab Nishter
options.b: Pandat Nehru, Abul Kalam Azad, and Baldu Singh
options.c: Khizar Hayat Tiwana, Liaquat Ali Khan, and Abul Kalam Azad

mcq.one_liner: The Congress was represented at the Shimla Conference of 1945 by **Pandat Nehru, Abul Kalam Azad, and Baldu Singh**.
